review: I love the idea of this thing!  I use it all the time because I take online classes with recorded lectures.  I sit in my living room and take notes while it plays my lectures, which is super convenient.  My issue is that despite its great potential, I am unable to successfully stream some video content from the internet because of lag or interference.  That is the whole big selling point for this item! I have tried everything trouble shoot and it even messes up on some of my lectures, which is frustrating.  When it works it's phenomenal, but when it doesn't I just want to throw it out the window.  So much potential if they could just debug or upgrade some of the materials! I also wanted to mention that it does have some really cool customizable background features, which post neat pictures, the time, current events, and weather.
